extension.description:
phpMyAdminLink Module for Joomla 2.5/3.0 Admin/Backend

 Vers. 1.1 Oct 26, 2012

 from Emil I Bohach @ eibconsult.com

Creates a link, in the admin status area, to your phpMyAdmin program (either local or remote) for quick access without needing to go through the web hosts control panel.

    4 steps to implement.

  1. Set the position of the module to status.
  2. Set the URL of your web hosts phpMyAdmin (the default shows how most local phpMyadmin programs are accessed).
  3. Determine allowed viewers/users of this link.
  4. Publish and save it.
The phpMyAdmin link should now appear in the status bar at the top.

This module is a fork of the original JooMyAdminLite module for Joomla 1.5 from Matthias Krauser
